title: Exploring Logical Complement in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the concept of logical complement in JavaScript. We will learn how to use the complement function to generate a new function that returns the opposite of the original function. This lab will help us better understand the logic and functional programming concepts in JavaScript.

meta.title: Logical Complement in JavaScript | Functional Programming
meta.description: Learn how to use the 'complement' function to generate a new function that returns the opposite of the original function in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Logical Complement, Functional Programming, Predicate Functions, Coding Tutorials

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 探索JavaScript中的逻辑补码
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索JavaScript中逻辑补码的概念。我们将学习如何使用complement函数来生成一个新函数，该函数返回原始函数的相反值。本实验将帮助我们更好地理解JavaScript中的逻辑和函数式编程概念。

meta.title: JavaScript中的逻辑补码 | 函数式编程
meta.description: 学习如何使用“complement”函数在JavaScript中生成一个新函数，该函数返回原始函数的相反值。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 逻辑补码, 函数式编程, 谓词函数, 编码教程

verify.name: 验证Node命令的用法
verify.hint: 通过在终端/SSH中输入'node'并按回车键，可以运行JavaScript。
